definition: interjection or grunt of agreement or recognition (e.g. yes, it's me!)/to sigh
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
sighing voice, wailing breath (idiom)/to heave deep sighs/to sigh in despair

sentences.english: In my life, I think to have a happy childhood is impassible.
sentences.chinese: 唉，我這輩子，是不可能有一個快樂的童年了。

sentences.english: Well, you know Peter, always leching after some woman or other.
sentences.chinese: 唉，你是知道彼得這個人的，他總是。

sentences.english: Alas, there’s no audio commentary so the offside rule remains a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 唉，因爲沒有現場語音解說，越位判定仍然是一個謎。

sentences.english: "Well, " she sigh a way, "so far, I must not swim past. "
sentences.chinese: “唉，”她嘆息道，“這麼遠，我肯定遊不過去的。”

sentences.english: Blimey, booking a hotel on line is very difficult.
sentences.chinese: 唉，在線預訂酒店是非常困難的。

sentences.english: Why, I'm that tired Sunday I can't even read the papers.
sentences.chinese: 唉，星期天我可是疲倦得要命，連報都懶得看的。

sentences.english: But oh, that magic feeling, nowhere to go.
sentences.chinese: 但是，唉，那巧妙的覺得，無處可去。

sentences.english: If one of you has a criminal record, whoops.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有犯罪記錄，唉，你沒戲了。

sentences.english: I realize, yeah, it was only just a dream.
sentences.chinese: 我明白了，唉，僅僅是夢一場。

sentences.english: But, alas, that's not how the work world works.
sentences.chinese: 但是，唉，在上班族的世界裏它沒有好作用。

sentences.english: Ouch! I hope I can walk.
Shall Time's best jewel from Time's chest lie hid?
sentences.chinese: 唉，怎能夠不被收進時光的寶箱？

sentences.english: Alas, I didn’t get even one response.
sentences.chinese: 唉，可惜我一個答覆也沒有得到。

sentences.english: Sigh, First I will get the Professor back then talk about it.
sentences.chinese: 唉等我先把老夫子取出來再說罷。

sentences.english: On the day when the lotus bloomed, alas, my mind was straying, and I knew it not.
sentences.chinese: 蓮花開放的那天，唉，我不自覺地在心魂飄蕩。

definition: hey!/(interjection used to attract attention or to express surprise or disapprobation)
interjection of wonder, shock or admiration
sentence-final particle (abbr. for 呢啊[ne5 a5] or variant of 哪[na5])
(interj. of admiration or of disgust)/to click one's tongue/to attempt to (find an opportunity to) speak
let it be/let it pass/forget about it
interjection expressing doubt or requiring answer/Eh?/what?
interjection of surprise or doubt/Eh?/My!/what's up?
interjection or grunt of agreement/uhm/Ah, OK/expression of recognition/Oh, it's you!
modal particle ending sentence, showing affirmation, approval, or consent
interjection indicating approval, appreciation or agreement
to force a smile/a bitter laugh
(particle equivalent to 啊 after a vowel, expressing surprise or doubt)
